entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then rain showers or flurries beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
